answerText: Thin-layer chromatography (TLC) [10] A common material that acts as the 'thin-layer' in TLC is this semi-plastic substance that is often used as a desiccant in food packaging.

question: Question: Identify the following things related to a certain type of chromatography FTPE.   [10] Similar to paper chromatography, this method involves spreading an adsorptive material onto a carrier plate and then having the components of the solution be drawn up the plate via capillary action.
